Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Conclusion: Increased toxicity and apoptosis under oxidative stress
Readout description.Result Description: The Gly2385Arg variant was more toxic and associated with a higher rate of apoptosis under condition of oxidative stress.

Biological replicates.Description: Not mentioned in the literature, but standard practice is to perform biological replicates for such studies.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not mentioned in the literature, but standard practice is to use ANOVA or similar methods.

Approved assay.Description: The experimental protocol used in the literature is generally used for studying Parkinson's disease.
